languages.text: Владайм Токара закончил жизнь обслуживающим сервитором уборочной команды и был утрачен ввиду ошибки техномата, направившего его навести порядок в отсек, подвергшийся шлюзованию. За небрежность, проявленную к имуществу, на техномата была наложена епитимья семикратного побития электрокнутом и штраф в размере годового довольствия.

Vladaym Tocara ended his days as a maintenance servitor on a janitorial team, losing his life due to an error by a technomat who sent him to clean a compartment scheduled for decompression. The technomat received a penance of seven electro-whippings and a fine equal to his annual pay as punishment for negligent handling of property.
languages.original_text: Владайм Токара закончил жизнь обслуживающим сервитором уборочной команды и был утрачен ввиду ошибки техномата, направившего его навести порядок в отсек, подвергшийся шлюзованию. За небрежность, проявленную к имуществу, на техномата была наложена епитимья семикратного побития электрокнутом и штраф в размере годового довольствия.

traits.locale_text: Vladaym Tocara met the end of his life as an operational servitor of a janitorial team. He was lost due to the mistake of a technomat, who sent him to clean the compartment, which got airlocked. For the negligence towards the property, the technomat received a penance of seven electric whippings and a fine equal to the yearly allowance.

Vladaym Tocara met the end of his life as an operational servitor of a janitorial team. He was lost due to the mistake of a technomat, who sent him to clean the compartment, which got airlocked. For the negligence towards the property, the technomat received a penance of seven electric whippings and a fine equal to the yearly allowance.

Vladaym Tocara met the end of his life as a maintenance servitor on a janitorial team due to the mistake of a technomat, who sent him to clean a compartment scheduled to be airlocked. The technomat received a penance of seven electro-whippings and a fine equal to its annual allowance as punishment for property negligence.

Vladaym Tocara met the end of his life as a maintenance servitor on a janitorial team due to the mistake of a technomat, who sent him to clean a compartment scheduled to be airlocked. The technomat received a penance of seven electro-whippings and a fine equal to its annual allowance as punishment for property negligence.

Vladaym Tocara ended his days as a maintenance servitor on a janitorial team, losing his life due to an error by a technomat who sent him to clean a compartment scheduled for decompression. The technomat received a penance of seven electro-whippings and a fine equal to his annual pay as punishment for negligent handling of property.

Vladaym Tocara ended his days as a maintenance servitor on a janitorial team, losing his life due to an error by a technomat who sent him to clean a compartment scheduled for decompression. The technomat received a penance of seven electro-whippings and a fine equal to his annual pay as punishment for negligent handling of property.

languages.text: 弗拉迪姆·托卡拉在船上的清洁小组中担任维修机仆。某天，某位技工派遣他去清洁某个舱室，但这个舱室按原定计划本该开闸减压。这个错误导致弗拉迪姆不幸丧命，而这位技工由于玩忽职守，被处以七次电鞭刑和相当于其全年工资的罚款。
languages.original_text: Vladaym Tocara ended his days as a maintenance servitor on a janitorial team, losing his life due to an error by a technomat who sent him to clean a compartment scheduled for decompression. The technomat received a penance of seven electro-whippings and a fine equal to his annual pay as punishment for negligent handling of property.

traits.locale_text: 弗拉迪姆·托卡拉在船上的清洁小组中担任维修奴工。某天，某位技工将派遣他去清洁某个舱室，但这个舱室却被预定开闸减压。这个错误导致弗拉迪姆不幸丧命，而这位技工由于玩忽职守，被处以七次电鞭刑和相当于其全年工资的罚款。

languages.text: Vladaym Tocara verbrachte sein restliches Leben als Wartungsservitor in einem Hausmeistertrupp. Er starb, als ein Technomat ihn versehentlich zum Putzen in ein Modul schickte, aus dem bald darauf der Druck abgelassen werden sollte. Der Technomat erhielt wegen fahrlässigen Umgangs mit fremdem Eigentum eine Strafe von sieben Elektropeitschenhieben und eine Geldstrafe in Höhe seines jährlichen Solds.
languages.original_text: Vladaym Tocara ended his days as a maintenance servitor on a janitorial team, losing his life due to an error by a technomat who sent him to clean a compartment scheduled for decompression. The technomat received a penance of seven electro-whippings and a fine equal to his annual pay as punishment for negligent handling of property.

traits.locale_text: Vladaym Tocara fand den Tod als Wartungsservitor in einem Hausmeistertrupp. Ein Technomat hatte ihn versehentlich zum Putzen in ein Modul geschickt, in dem bald darauf die Luftschleuse geöffnet werden sollte. Der Technomat erhielt wegen fahrlässigen Umgangs mit fremdem Eigentum eine Strafe von sieben Elektropeitschenhieben und eine Geldstrafe in Höhe seines jährlichen Solds.

languages.text: La vie de Vladaym Tocara, devenu servitor de maintenance, s'acheva lorsqu'un technomate l'envoya par erreur nettoyer un compartiment qui devait être dépressurisé. En guise de sanction pour négligence matérielle, le technomate reçut sept coups d'électrofouet ainsi qu'une amende équivalente à son indemnité annuelle.
languages.original_text: Vladaym Tocara ended his days as a maintenance servitor on a janitorial team, losing his life due to an error by a technomat who sent him to clean a compartment scheduled for decompression. The technomat received a penance of seven electro-whippings and a fine equal to his annual pay as punishment for negligent handling of property.

traits.locale_text: La vie de Vladaym Tocara, devenu servitor de maintenance, s’acheva lorsqu'un technomate l’envoya par erreur nettoyer un compartiment qui devait être dépressurisé. En guise de sanction pour négligence matérielle, le technomate reçut sept coups d’électrofouet ainsi qu'une amende équivalente à son indemnité annuelle.

languages.text: Vladaym Tocara llegó a su fin como servidor de mantenimiento en un equipo de limpieza debido al error de un tecnómata, que le envió a limpiar un compartimento que iba a ser despresurizado. El tecnómata fue condenado a siete electrolatigazos y una multa igual a su salario anual como castigo por negligencia con los recursos.
languages.original_text: Vladaym Tocara ended his days as a maintenance servitor on a janitorial team, losing his life due to an error by a technomat who sent him to clean a compartment scheduled for decompression. The technomat received a penance of seven electro-whippings and a fine equal to his annual pay as punishment for negligent handling of property.

traits.locale_text: Vladaym Tocara llegó a su fin como servidor de mantenimiento en un equipo de limpieza debido al error de un tecnómata, que le envió a limpiar un compartimento que iba a ser presurizado. El tecnómata fue condenado a siete electrolatigazos y una multa igual a su sueldo anual como castigo por negligencia con los recursos.

languages.text: ヴラダイム・トカラは、減圧が予定されていた区画の清掃を彼に命じたテクノマットのミスにより、清掃チームのメンテナンス・サーヴィターとして人生の最期を迎えた。問題を起こしたテクノマットは、財産の取り扱いを怠った罰として、7回の電気ムチ打ちと年俸と同額の罰金を受けた。
languages.original_text: Vladaym Tocara ended his days as a maintenance servitor on a janitorial team, losing his life due to an error by a technomat who sent him to clean a compartment scheduled for decompression. The technomat received a penance of seven electro-whippings and a fine equal to his annual pay as punishment for negligent handling of property.

traits.locale_text: ヴラダイム・トカラは、エアロックが予定されていた区画の清掃を彼に命じたテクノマットのミスにより、清掃チームのメンテナンス・サーヴィターとして人生の最期を迎えた。そのテクノマットは、財産の過失に対する罰として、7回の電気ムチ打ちと年俸と同額の罰金を受けた。

languages.text: Vladaym Tocara hayatının geri kalanını temizlik görevlilerinden oluşan bir ekipte bakım hizmetörü olarak geçirdi, bir teknomatonun onu basınç değişimi yapılması planlanan bir kompartımana yanlışlıkla temizliğe yollaması nedeniyle hayatını kaybetti. Teknomaton, mülkler konusunda ihmalkâr davranmasına karşılık olarak yedi elektro kırbaca maruz kaldı ve yıllık maaşına eşit bir ceza aldı.
languages.original_text: Vladaym Tocara ended his days as a maintenance servitor on a janitorial team, losing his life due to an error by a technomat who sent him to clean a compartment scheduled for decompression. The technomat received a penance of seven electro-whippings and a fine equal to his annual pay as punishment for negligent handling of property.

Teknomaton, mülkler konusunda ihmalkâr davranmasına karşılık olarak yedi elektro kırbaca maruz kaldı ve yıllık maaşına eşit bir ceza aldı.
